channel.title: Wtf?
channel.description:
ok , my last topic is locked i was asking for help of how to run moparscape on linux... and its locked
thats great running of a board to lock a topic with no explination , so MODS , if your gonna lock this PLEASE tell me why and where im suppose to post a topic about this , even tho this is the linux section so i cant see why this isnt the right place...

item.title: Wtf?
item.dc:creator: @C-4 C-4
item.description:

on windows all i did is double click the file and it opens…

i need to kno the command for the terminal to run it

item.title: Wtf?
item.dc:creator: @voiD_dev voiD dev
item.description:
@voiD_dev wrote:

You can run the jar. I think Moparisthebest included a shell script with the client.

just do:

sh filename.sh

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf?
